name: Aitemu kogeki
description:
Survive Item Attack in a nice mixture of platformer, retro pixel art and cuteness!

You play as an adventurer that met a bueatifull maid being attacked by RPG-items. There is infinite amount of levels, so you can save the game whenevenr you want to!

Each level has a unique background and hardness. Play your way, using the platforms and catching yellow hearts to heal. The game never gets boring with such a big amout of levels and items!  The world of Aitemu kogeki awaits you.
